subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Santino Quaranta scored in the 36th minute and Jaime Moreno converted a stoppage-time penalty kick to help D.C. United defeat the Red Bulls, 2-0.
snippet: Santino Quaranta scored in the 36th minute and Jaime Moreno converted a stoppage-time penalty kick to help D.C. United defeat the Red Bulls, 2-0.
